title: FS - Price Lowered on Remaining Six T206 Graded Lot
author: Edwolf1963

posts.post_title: FS - Price Lowered on Remaining Six T206 Graded Lot
posts.post_content:
FS - Graded T206s - SLer, Commons.  All proces are delivered, Paypal (gift please), check or MO.  PM or email.

T206 Red Murray, SGC40, Piedmont (Fact 25) - $35 **SOLD**
T206 Jimmy Hart, SGC40, SLer, Piedmont 350 - $85  **SOLD**
T206 George McBride, SGC30, Piedmont 350 - $25
T206 Harry Krausse, SGC30, PB - $25 **SOLD**
T206 Lou Criger, SGCA, SOV150 - $25 **SOLD**
T206 John Anderson, SGCA, SC350 - $18
T206 Ed Lennox, SGCA, SOV 350 - $22 **SOLD**
T206 Bob Bescher (Hands in Air), SGC40, PB - $35 **SOLD**
T206 Harry Lumley, PSA3, Piedmont 350 - $32 **SOLD**

Thank you, as always, for your interest!
Email sent on T206 Jimmy Hart
Criger looks trimmed, notice how the top white border gets smaller on the one side, but only on the top of the card.   if the image was crooked, it would be on all four sides.

Perhaps Jim, I thought it was a miscut - actually looks long to me..??  To be honest, the Lumley looked more trimmed - appears a bit short, but case is fine, no tamper and PSA numbers line-up with card.

posts.post_title: Prices lowered and lot price offered
posts.post_content: Bump to reflect lowered prices and lot price offered on remaining T206s
